full_description:
Thermaltake Smart BX1 550W Non Modular 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply

Thermaltake Smart BX1 550W Power Supply is a dependable and efficient way to power your system. It assures energy economy with its 80 Plus Bronze accreditation, offering 550W of continuous power for consistent performance. The power supply has a non-modular architecture, which simplifies cable management. It has minimal ripple noise and high-quality Japanese primary capacitors for increased dependability. The addition design gives a touch of customization and elegance. This power supply can manage the needs of diverse components with a maximum power output of 550 watts and a peak capacity of 660W. The input parameters span from 100V to 240V AC, allowing for use in a variety of electrical situations. Whether you're a gamer or a PC enthusiast, the Thermaltake Smart BX1 550W Power Supply provides a balance of efficiency, performance, and visual appeal to fulfill the power requirements of your system.

Smart BX1 550W (230V)

The Smart BX1 series is 80 PLUS Bronze certified, has an energy efficiency of 88%, and comes in 450W - 750W power options. The power supply includes a 120 mm hydraulic fan, Japanese primary capacitors, and other quality components to assure continuous and consistent output at temperatures up to 40 °C, nearly silent operation, and dependable performance.

Extremely quiet fan with 120 mm hydraulic bearing

To provide outstanding cooling performance and nearly silent operation, the Smart BX1 power supply has a 120 mm fan with hydraulic bearings and clever speed control.

Low ripple noise

All ripple of Smart BX1 power supply is less than 80 mV at +12 V and less than 40 mV at +5 V or +3.3 V from 0% to 100% load, ensuring stable operation and the performance of components such as high-end graphics cards. This permits them to operate consistently for a longer period of time.

product_page_short_description: 80 PLUS Gold Certified, Main Japanese Capacitors
full_description:
Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply

The Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W is a high-performance power supply designed to meet the demanding needs of next-generation computer hardware. It boasts 80 PLUS Gold certification, ensuring up to 90% energy efficiency, which reduces energy waste and saves on electricity bills. Fully compatible with Intel's ATX 3.0 specifications, this power supply supports up to 200% power excursion and achieves 60% low load efficiency. Additionally, it is PCIe Gen 5.0 ready, featuring a native 16-pin (12VHPWR) PCIe connector capable of delivering up to 300W to PCIe 5.0 graphics cards, supporting the latest GPUs seamlessly. The Toughpower GF A3 is its Smart Zero Fan, which employs a 120mm fluid-bearing fan that remains off until the load exceeds 40%, thus minimizing noise. The use of high-quality Japanese main electrolytic capacitors enhances durability, stability, and reliability. Furthermore, the power supply employs a powerful single +12V rail and advanced LLC and DC-to-DC circuit design for stable power delivery and superior voltage regulation. The Toughpower GF A3 also includes multiple industrial-grade protection mechanisms, such as Current Protection (OCP), Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Under Voltage Protection (UVP), Over Power Protection (OPP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Over Temperature Protection (OTP). Its fully modular design features low-profile flat cables, which aid in better cable management and airflow within the PC case. Optimized to work with all generations of Intel processors, including those with C6/C7 sleep states for maximum energy savings, the Toughpower GF A3 is also certified to Cybernetics Platinum in both 115V and 230V input ranges, with an overall efficiency rating of ≥89% to <91%. In terms of noise levels, it holds a Cybernetics A- certification, indicating a relatively quiet operation. The Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W power supply is an ideal choice for users seeking a reliable, efficient, and quiet power solution for their high-end gaming rigs or workstations. Its support for the latest ATX and PCIe standards ensures compatibility with the newest technologies, providing robust power delivery for demanding applications.

Buy Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Thermaltake Power Supply to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 750W Power Supply comes with 10 Years of warranty.

full_description:
Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 650W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply

The Toughpower GF1 Gold Series 650W is crafted by using cutting-edge technology and materials to become the fusion of aesthetics and performance. The series supports synchronization with compatible RGB motherboards from ASUS, GIGABYTE, MSI, and ASRock for countless illumination possibilities. With the most stable but silent operation, the Toughpower GF1 Gold meets and even exceeds the demanding specification of the overclocker, gamers, or enthusiastic PC user.

Illuminate with Twisting Blade Shining from Perfect Circles

The built-in Riing Duo 14 RGB Fan features dual rings with 18 addressable LEDs, great light coverage, and uniform color and brightness to paint your build with 16.8 million colors. 

Zero Cable Platform & Ultra Quiet Smart Zero Fan

Farewell to messy cables! The daughterboards are directly soldered to the motherboard for better heat dissipation and impressive output power quality. And also the Smart Zero Fan starts to operate when the power supply working load goes over 40%, the undesired noise will be minimized. In this Power Supply, the user-friendly switch is set on the back panel for those who prefer the fan to spin constantly.

Ripple Noise & Extremely Strict Voltage

All ripples are lower than 30mV on +12V, +5V, or +3.3V from 0% to 100% load to ensure excellent performance and a reliable operation. The voltage regulation, more strict than Intelâ€™s standard Â±5% for major rails and Â±10% for -12V, is set to no more than Â±2% for major rails to meet the highest performance. This new 650W power supply comes with high-quality 105 Â°C (221 Â° F) Japanese capacitors to help improve durability and offer impressive stability.

Fully Modular Low-profile Flat Black Cables

The series offers cable selection for users while powering the system at an advantageous voltage. The low-profile flat black cables make cable management easier, reduce clutter and increase airflow inside the chassis.

Powerful single +12V rail helps ensure a stable and reliable supply to other PC components. This Power Supply saves energy through its high energy efficiency up to 90% and is certified to 80 PLUS Gold. The series has been optimized to work with all generations of Intelâ€™s processors to achieve maximum energy saving. The Latest Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 comes with 10 years warranty.

product_page_short_description: 80 PLUS Gold Certified, Main Japanese Capacitors
full_description:
Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 850W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply

The Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 850W is a high-performance power supply unit (PSU) designed to meet the demands of next-generation hardware. Certified with 80 PLUS Gold efficiency, it ensures up to 90% energy savings and reliable performance. Fully compliant with Intel’s ATX 3.0 specifications, this PSU is equipped with a native PCIe Gen 5.0 12VHPWR connector, making it ready to power the latest graphics cards with ease. The Toughpower GF A3 series includes a 16-pin (12VHPWR) connector capable of delivering up to 450W to support the latest PCIe 5.0 graphics cards, ensuring stable and powerful performance. This power supply unit (PSU) employs premium Japanese electrolytic capacitors to improve stability, dependability, and longevity. With its 120mm fluid bearing fan and Smart Zero Fan technology, it minimizes noise during low to moderate use by turning off only when the load falls below 40%. To improve voltage control, LLC and DC-to-DC circuit design are combined with the high amperage single +12V rail to provide optimal compatibility and smooth power delivery. Your system is protected by several industrial-grade safeguards, which include Over Current Protection (OCP), Voltage Protection (OVP), Voltage Protection (UVP), Power Protection (OPP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Over Temperature Protection (OTP). Completely modular in design, the low-profile, flat black cables simplify cable management, clear up clutter, and enhance chassis airflow. The Toughpower GF A3 850W has an overall efficiency of between ≥89% and <91% thanks to its Cybernetics Platinum certification for efficiency in both 115V and 230V inputs. Moreover, it has been certified by Cybenetics as having a noise level of A- at 115V and A at 230V, guaranteeing silent operation under a range of loads. The Thermaltake Toughpower GF A3 850W is designed to keep up with the power requirements of contemporary graphics cards and other high-performance parts. For professionals, content producers, and gamers looking for a dependable and effective power supply for their high-end systems, this PSU is a great option because of its solid build quality and innovative functionality. With the Toughpower GF A3 850W, you can construct a new system or upgrade an old one with the power, efficiency, and stability required to handle the newest developments in computer hardware technology.

full_description:
Thermaltake Toughpower GF3 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply

The Thermaltake Toughpower GF3 1000W Fully Modular Power Supply includes a 13.5cm fluid-bearing fan, Japanese capacitors, and other premium components to provide continuous and stable power. The fully modular Toughpower GF3 series is available in 1650W, 1350W, 1200W, 1000W, 850W, and 750W capacities and is designed to achieve 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. Aims to provide the finest performance possible. Thermaltake's power GF3 series saves energy thanks to its excellent energy efficiency of up to 90% and is 80 PLUS Gold certified. To ensure optimum energy savings, the series has been tuned to function with all generations of Intel processors. The GF3 series is designed to support NVIDIA and AMD graphics cards, and it is ready to deliver the graphics card in a variety of methods. The Toughpower GF3 power supply Gold fulfills, if not exceeds, the stringent requirements of the overclocker or avid PC user. It is designed for next-generation PCIe 5.0 graphics cards and is compliant with Intel ATX 3.0 requirements. The Toughpower GF3 power supply has a 16-pin connector and a powerful and steady performance that allows it to support 100% next-generation GPUs. The recommended wattage is the one specified on the 12VHPWR connection. Toughpower GF3 series is fully compatible with Intel ATX 3.0 specifications, allowing for up to 200% power excursion, 70% low load efficiency, and compliance with power supply timing regulations. The GF3 series can withstand up to 3x GPU power deviation and 2x overall power deviation. The power supply voltage regulation is adjusted to no more than 2% for key rails, which is stricter than Intel's normal +5%,-7% for important rails, and 10% for -12V, providing constant clean power through remarkable voltage stability. Provides users with several cable options while powering the system at an attractive voltage. Thermaltake Toughpower GF3 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply comes with a 10-year warranty.
